title: Tree Plantation Drive in Dhaka
excerpt: Our volunteers planted over 1,000 trees to promote sustainability and fight climate change.
content: On November 10th, our team organized a tree plantation drive in Dhaka...

title: Healthcare Camp for Rural Communities
excerpt: We provided free medical checkups and medicines to over 500 villagers.
content: Our healthcare camp reached over 500 villagers in rural Bangladesh...

title: Scholarship Program Launched
excerpt: Supporting 200 students with scholarships to continue their education.
content: We launched a scholarship program to support 200 students...

title: New Volunteer Orientation
excerpt: We welcomed 50 new volunteers with an orientation session in Romford.
content: On November 20th, we hosted an orientation session for 50 new volunteers in Romford...
